title: Where are my photos and videos saved? Can I change the save location?
answer:
[Photos and videos are preferentially stored on the microSD card. If no microSD card is installed, they are stored on the internal storage. You can change the save path for your photos and videos by performing the following steps:]() 

 Touch Camera > Settings > Preferred save location. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110546)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110547)

 If you select Internal storage, photos and videos are stored in File Manager/Internal storage/DCIM/Camera. 

 [If you select SD card, photos and videos are stored in File Manager/SD card/DCIM/Camera. ]()
